sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The miracle of the peace in Fraunce Celebrated by the ghost of the diuine Du Bartas. / Translated, by Iosuah Sylvester. Miracle de la paix en France. English. Du Nesme, Jean. Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590. Sylvester, Josuah, 1563-1618.
70 p.
By Richard Bradocke for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleet street at the signe of the Bible, Imprinted at London : 1599.
In fact an original work by Jean du Nesme, whose name appears on A2v. A translation of Jean Du Nesme's: Le miracle de la paix en France. In verse. Identified as STC 7353+ on film. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

70 p.
By Richard Bradocke for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleet street at the signe of the Bible, Imprinted at London : 1599.
In fact an original work by Jean du Nesme, whose name appears on A2v. A translation of Jean Du Nesme's: Le miracle de la paix en France. In verse. Identified as STC 7353+ on film. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
